item.description:
Hey all,

How about a weekend trip to the Shawangunks near New Paltz, NY? This is geared towards experienced climbers that have rope and trad gear, and can lead or pair up with a leader. We can leave the Boston area Friday afternoon, climb Sat and Sun, and return Sunday afternoon. I will provide information on where we can camp out Fri and Sat nights. In addition, there is a $15/day entry fee or you can purchase an annual membership for $85. For more information you can visit:

http://www.gunks.com...
http://www.mohonkpres...

In case of rain, I will push it out to the following weekend. Please contact me if you have any questions.

Thanks!
Lopa
item.name: Weekend trip to the Gunks! - Tentative
